content.raw: I'm having mixed feelings about this. Not sure what the best name is, but with the current implementation `offset` doesn't seem to describe the behaviour. What does it mean if you give it an `offset` of `UnitZ`? The current implementation would rotate `UnitX` to match `UnitZ`. Is that what one would expect? Maybe we should change the implementation as well...
